…
@skye <https://github.com/skye>, do you know if pip is supposed to allow writing c++ code directly. I always thought you needed to build from source in order to do that. — You are receiving this because you authored the thread. body:
Many header files are part of pip.


Am 13.06.2017 11:33 schrieb "Andrew Selle" <notifications@github.com>:

> @skye <https://github.com/skye>, do you know if pip is supposed to allow
> writing c++ code directly. I always thought you needed to build from source
> in order to do that.
